 The concept of evil does not exist in reality. It is a concept made up by humans to label something that we perceive to be 'bad.' There may be agreement by many that X is evil, but that does not mean that whatever X is, that X is absolutely evil. It just means that some humans label X as evil, which they are certainly free to do. But it doesn't mean that all humans will label X as evil. Nor does it mean that X is absolutely evil, separate from interpretation by any human being. Apart from a human being assigning a value to X, X is simply X.
